Room.Name: Eye of the Whirlpool
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the very center of the whirlpool, looking at the cliffs above.
Room.LongDescription: A high waterfall drops from the top of the cliff and adds to turmoil of the swirling water. From this point in the center of the whirlpool you can hear the hollow echoing sound of water crashing into what sounds like some kind of a chamber. The water is not moving so fast that you could not break free if you wished, so at the moment you are not in any danger.
